meanings.definition: A place where oil workers live and work.
meanings.sent1: The oilcamps in the desert provide shelter for workers.
meanings.sent2: Many workers stay at the oilcamps during their shifts.
meanings.sent3: The oilcamps were so crowded that workers had to share rooms.
meanings.sent4: The oilcamps were like bustling mini-cities in the middle of nowhere.
meanings.sent5: The image of the oilcamps under the starry sky stayed with him forever.

meanings.definition: To establish or set up a camp for oil workers.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to oilcamps near the drilling site.
meanings.sent2: They oilcamps quickly to accommodate the new workers.
meanings.sent3: He oilcamps with such efficiency that everyone was impressed.
meanings.sent4: She oilcamps like a pro, ensuring all facilities were in place.
meanings.sent5: The team oilcamps in record time, ready for the upcoming project.

meanings.definition: The act of living and working in a camp for oil workers.
meanings.sent1: Living in the oilcamps can be challenging due to the harsh conditions.
meanings.sent2: The oilcamps provide a sense of community for the workers.
meanings.sent3: During downtime, the workers often socialize in the oilcamps.
meanings.sent4: The oilcamps symbolize the dedication of workers to their jobs.
meanings.sent5: The oilcamps buzzed with activity from dawn till dusk.
